long_description: SRAM Rival WiFLi 10-speed rear derailleur offers a wider range of gearing compatibility, easier setup and great weight savings over a triple-ring chainring system for simple, fast shifts. WiFLi (Wider, Faster, Lighter) design is compatible with a wide-ranging cassette and offers fast, precise shifts without the weight and complexity of a triple-chainring system. Exact Actuation means precise, even gear changes throughout the shifting range-when you move a shifter, the derailleur moves the same amount for 1:1 action. Aluminum cage and inner link save weight and help maintain resilient, lasting performance. Medium cage length of the SRAM Rival WiFLi 10-speed rear derailleur is designed for use with 2 x 10-speed systems and accommodates up to an 11-32 cassette.
short_description: SRAM Rival WiFLi 10-speed rear derailleur offers a wider range of gearing compatibility, easier setup and great weight savings over a triple-ring chainring system for simple, fast shifts.
